com.ooyala.android.ui.LayoutController

Packages that use LayoutController

Uses of LayoutController in com.ooyala.android
 

Methods in com.ooyala.android that return LayoutController
 LayoutController OoyalaPlayerLayout.getLayoutController()
          Returns the LayoutController corresponding to this OoyalaPlayerLayout.
 

Methods in com.ooyala.android with parameters of type LayoutController
 void OoyalaPlayer.setLayoutController(LayoutController layoutController)
          Set the layout controller from which the OoyalaPlayer should fetch the layout to display to
 void OoyalaPlayerLayout.setLayoutController(LayoutController controller)
          Set the LayoutController corresponding to this OoyalaPlayerLayout.
 

Uses of LayoutController in com.ooyala.android.ui
 

Classes in com.ooyala.android.ui that implement LayoutController
 class com.ooyala.android.ui.AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
           
 class OoyalaPlayerLayoutController
          This LayoutController is a generic LayoutController that will work in most cases (regardless of the containing Layout type).
 class OptimizedOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
          This LayoutController is a faster LayoutController that will work only on one specific case: The OoyalaPlayerLayout it controls is a direct child of the Activity's base layout which is a FrameLayout.
